metadata.title: CVE-2018-12827 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Adobe Flash Player 30.0.0.134 and earlier have an out-of-bounds readvulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to informationdisclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12827` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 1:20180814.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
flashplugin-installer - 1:20180814.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:20180814.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.2').
